name: Customer Downloads Manager
author: Ryan Bayne

sections.description:
Provide customers with future access to purchased files. Allows customer to enter their payment reference number to assign a product to their account. Set how
many times a customer can download the files. Uses a download plugin and cart intigration.

Arbitrary section

Please email info@brighterwebs.com with any questions regarding this plugin.
sections.installation: Standard Wordpess plugin procedure then activate intigration with the other plugins you have installed in your blog.
sections.changelog:
0.1.1

  • Plugin 2nd August 2010
  • Replaced download link with a button to avoid url being copied and passed to other users.
  • Lowercase in sql no longer causing all activations to get rejected

0.1

  • Plugin launched 31st July 2010

short_description: Intigrations download and cart plugins to create a link between both then offer controlled downloads to customers for purchased files.
